title.rendered: Upcoming Winter Concerts Throughout The District

content.rendered:
Experience the incredible talent of our student musicians at these upcoming winter concerts across the district:

  • December 9: Grades 6 and 8 Orchestra – Maple Avenue Auditorium, 7:30 p.m.
  • December 10: Grade 8 Orchestra & HS Symphonic Orchestra – Maple Avenue Auditorium, 7 p.m.
  • December 11: Chamber Orchestra, Jazz Ensemble, and Choraliers – SSHS Auditorium, 7 p.m.
  • December 17: Grade 6 Band – Maple Avenue Auditorium, 6:30 p.m.; Grades 7 & 8 Band – Maple Avenue Auditorium, 7:15 p.m.
  • December 18: Bel Canto, Mixed Chorus, Symphonic and Concert Band – SSHS Auditorium, 7 p.m.
  • January 14: Grade 6 Chorus – Maple Avenue Auditorium, 7 p.m.
  • January 15: Grades 7 & 8 Chorus – Maple Avenue Auditorium, 7 p.m.

Be sure to check the calendar of events often for all school events.
